acceptance-test-run.title: Memoization should work correctly for collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: memoizationShouldWorkCorrectlyForCollectionsAndArrays

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MemoizationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type qVfyfMd_NP
Then the collection should have exactly IOnVLrhCb7 elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type Z7ErX7EYei
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type 35pvg7FPEA=IS8bXSbTWd and value of type 8rA2uyrJSq=6r56toWw7t
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
